data.why:
Hi, it's actually Alan.Burlison@sun.com here. I'd like to set up a
    new account for us to upload some modules that we are opensourcing.
    The above email address expands tro myself and one other Solaris
    engineer who look after the perl we ship in Solaris.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (SUNCPAN; Sun CPAN Module Support)
